title: P v. NP, Complexity Theory
description:
Matt and I discuss this million dollar question. Please add your distinctiveness to the collective through the comments. Join the Resistance:-)

Matt's YouTube channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCon-YE6Xu33z3xihmF_WRrQ

Complexity Theory, P v. NP:  
https://youtu.be/u2DLlNQiPB4
https://youtu.be/YX40hbAHx3s
